definition: words from the bottom of one's heart
from the bottom of one's heart (idiom)

sentences.english: A moving legend was often told around the area of Zhongxian County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 在四川忠县一带，则流传着一则感人肺腑的传说。

sentences.english: This but is her heartfelt words, afterward rarely being wine, easily and then vomited out.
sentences.chinese: 这却是她的肺腑之言，难得是酒后，轻易便吐了出来。

sentences.english: I'll be the first to admit it, What i was writing was somewhat touchy-feely.
sentences.chinese: 我首先要承认，我现在所写的就是我的肺腑之言。

sentences.english: I give my apology sincerely to you all, unreservedly and with my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我发自肺腑地毫无保留地向你们所有的人道歉。

sentences.english: 2Test me, O Lord , and try me, examine my heart and my mind;
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，求你察看我，试验我，熬炼我的肺腑心肠。
我发自肺腑的谢谢你们。

sentences.english: Before my speech, allow me to say a few words from the bottom of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 演讲前，请允许我说几句发自肺腑的话。

sentences.english: His speech was inspiring and touched my heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的发言鼓舞人心，动人肺腑。

sentences.english: I enjoy the mild soothing aroma rising from the tea cup to my nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢闻从茶杯中飘出的淡淡的沁人肺腑的清香。

sentences.english: After listening to friends, she let me remark at a loss.
sentences.chinese: 听了朋友的话，她的肺腑之言让我茫然。

sentences.english: So this is what they call a heartwarming family reunion, eh?
sentences.chinese: 这就是俗话说的，“感人肺腑的一家团圆”吗？

sentences.english: The story of Shanbo Liang and Yingtai Zhu is one of the most affecting story of the whole Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 梁山伯与祝英台的故事是中国最感人肺腑的故事之一。

sentences.english: Sent bursts of fragrance slowly breeze, Qin Run the heart.
sentences.chinese: 徐徐轻风送来阵阵清香，沁润肺腑。

sentences.english: Here, auspicious snow swirling in the air, the fresh air -----.
sentences.chinese: 这里瑞雪纷飞，清新的空气沁人肺腑。

sentences.english: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，求你察看我，试验我，熬炼我的肺腑心肠。

sentences.english: Can't deny what I say a trifle and disgusting, but wear is all my heartfelt words.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认我说的有点肉麻，但着都是我的肺腑之言。

definition: (usually of sth intangible) to seep into/to permeate
inner feelings/what is deep in one's heart
in the depth of one's soul
to the bone/to the marrow/fig. to a very large degree
to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
heart (as the seat of emotions)/cardiac atrium
lit. lips and teeth (idiom); fig. close partners/interdependent
